593930.name: Episode 2 - Total War: Warhammer II
593930.description: Step into the world of Warhammer with this episode of The FOO Show! Will dives into Total War: Warhammer II with Henry Hankin and Al Bickham of Creative Assembly, the developers of Total War: Warhammer II. In this episode, Henry and Al explain Warhammer to Will, then we take a closer look at the miniature elves, lizardmen, and other units from the game, while we discuss the challenges of bringing Warhammer to the high strategy of a Total War game.
